Title: Tremors 3: Back to Perfection
Writer: S.S. Wilson (story), Brent Maddock (story), Nancy Roberts (story), John Whelpley (teleplay)
Actors: Michael Gross, Shawn Christian, Susan Chuang, Charlotte Stewart
Plot: The now famous Burt Gummer returns to his hometown of Perfection, Nevada for the first time in years, but the deadliest Graboid evolution yet forces him to save the town he swore to protect.
